incorrect_answers: Shinya Aoki was the mainstay of Dream, being part of over 15 shows.
context: Dream (styled DREAM in capitals) was a Japanese mixed martial arts (MMA) organization promoted by former PRIDE FC executives and K-1 promoter Fighting and Entertainment Group.
